snippet.title: nullptr - a 2D hacking action puzzle game
snippet.description:
A 2D action puzzle game where you play the role of a hacker. Take down megacorporations by invading their servers to download classified data. Reprogram the servers and exploit sentinel weaknesses to ensure safe routes and avoid being traced.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579650/nullptr/

#indiegames #gamedev #gaming
